title: Smolarnia, Czarnków-Trzcianka County
text:
Smolarnia () is a <a href="village">village</a> in the administrative district of <a href="Gmina%20Trzcianka">Gmina Trzcianka</a>, within <a href="Czarnk%C3%B3w-Trzcianka%20County">Czarnków-Trzcianka County</a>, <a href="Greater%20Poland%20Voivodeship">Greater Poland Voivodeship</a>, in west-central Poland. It lies approximately west of <a href="Trzcianka">Trzcianka</a>, north-west of <a href="Czarnk%C3%B3w">Czarnków</a>, and north-west of the regional capital <a href="Pozna%C5%84">Poznań</a>.
The village has an approximate population of 130.
References.
